title: [COMPLETE] Scheduled Maintenance - Patch 5.17 - 2/09/2015
body: On 02/09/15, starting at 04:00 Sydney Time (18:00 UTC), ranked queues will be disabled in preparation for patch 5.17. At 05:30 Sydney Time (19:30 UTC), the servers will be shut down and all games currently in progress will end in a draw and stats will not be recorded. We estimate the battlegrounds will be unavailable for 3 hours.
